citation.title: 0 Computational semantics: the semantics of the temporal expressions (for example, the set of expressions referring to past events) along with the semantics of grammatical tenses 4The goal of the presented system is to detect only the expressions which modify the temporal parameters of the sentence. Hence, unlike some other studies on temporal tagging or armotaiton (Mani et al.2001), we deliberately ruled out expressions which do not answer to the question when. Nikolai Vazov is a constituent element of the aspecto-temporal value of the sentence (Battistelli2000; Vazov1999).
citation.rawString: (Ben Hazez and Minel2000). 0 Computational semantics: the semantics of the temporal expressions (for example, the set of expressions referring to past events) along with the semantics of grammatical tenses 4The goal of the presented system is to detect only the expressions which modify the temporal parameters of the sentence. Hence, unlike some other studies on temporal tagging or armotaiton (Mani et al.2001), we deliberately ruled out expressions which do not answer to the question when. Nikolai Vazov is a constituent element of the aspecto-temporal value of the sentence (Battistelli2000; Vazov1999).
